item.title: Monday.com and Automation Specialist Needed - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description:
We are a fast-growing graphic design agency that operates on a subscription-based model. We’re looking for an experienced Monday.com expert who specializes in building data-driven dashboards, optimizing workflows, and creating advanced automations tailored to subscription businesses. This will be a long-term collaboration with a focus on scaling our operations through robust systems.

What We Need:

Custom Dashboard Development:

Build dashboards (in Monday.com or externally via Power BI, Google Data Studio) that provide clear insights into:
Time taken to complete each design.
Monthly design usage per client.
Time from package purchase to first design submission.
Daily and monthly design uploads, segmented by client.
Client retention analysis based on monthly design uploads.
Automatic tracking of client retention months.
Daily alerts for designs that are overdue.
Complex Automations:

Automatically send reminders if clients do not upload brand assets within X days post-onboarding.
Trigger notifications if a client hasn't submitted a request within a specific period.
Gamified notifications when clients exceed certain design usage thresholds.
Subscription renewal reminders based on activity levels, usage patterns, and churn risk indicators.
Advanced Data Tracking & Analysis:

Create formulas to monitor client activity and flag inactivity based on custom thresholds.
Implement time-tracking columns to monitor each stage of the design process.
Set up sentiment analysis for client feedback, categorizing responses as positive or negative for better insight.
What We’re Looking For:

Extensive Monday.com Experience: Proven experience in building complex workflows, dashboards, and automations within Monday.com.
Data Visualization Skills: Ability to integrate Monday.com data with platforms like Power BI or Google Data Studio for in-depth reporting.
Subscription-Based Business Expertise: Understanding of subscription models, especially in creative services, and how to use data to reduce churn and increase engagement.
Automation Specialist: Deep knowledge of Monday.com automations and integrations with tools like Zapier, Integromat (Make), and custom API setups.
Long-Term Partnership: We’re looking to establish a long-term relationship with someone who can continue to optimize our processes as we scale.
What You Bring:

Examples of similar projects where you’ve helped businesses optimize client workflows, increase retention, and improve operational efficiency.
Case studies showcasing your ability to translate business needs into effective systems within Monday.com.
Creative problem-solving skills and the ability to suggest proactive improvements beyond the initial scope.
What’s In It for You:

Ongoing work with a forward-thinking agency focused on growth and innovation.
A collaborative environment where your expertise is valued and your solutions have a direct impact on our success.
Flexibility to work remotely and contribute at your own pace while delivering high-impact results.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$40.00
Posted On: August 17, 2024 09:13 UTC
Category: Scripting & Automation
Skills:API Integration, Business Process Automation, Dashboard, Spreadsheet Automation, Google Sheets, Automation, Business Intelligence, Data Entry, Microsoft Excel
Skills: API Integration, Business Process Automation, Dashboard, Spreadsheet Automation, Google Sheets, Automation, Business Intelligence, Data Entry, Microsoft Excel
Country: Israel

item.title: Solution Architect & Developer - .NET, Azure, DevOps Practitioner - Upwork
item.description:
Solution Architect

Job Title: Solution Architect & Developer - .NET, Azure, DevOps Practitioner

SEE/EYE Overview:

SEE/EYE goes beyond being a Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) platform; it's a transformative solution designed to redefine success in continuous improvement. Our platform empowers professionals across diverse industries, from Product Teams and Engineers to Business Analysts and Improvement Engineers.

Core Values:

Honesty: At SEE/EYE, honesty is our foundation. We believe in straightforward communication and openness.

Transparency: Transparency is not just a value; it's a commitment. SEE/EYE ensures that every stakeholder navigates processes and metrics with clarity.

Collaboration: Collaboration is the heartbeat of SEE/EYE, centralizing product management and enhancing teamwork across organizations.

Efficiency: SEE/EYE is your ally in efficiency, reducing time spent on tool-switching, manual processes, and complex improvement methodologies.

Learning: In the spirit of continuous improvement, SEE/EYE encourages a culture of learning, ensuring that our platform evolves with the needs of our users.

Experience the SEE/EYE difference and unlock a new era of honesty, transparency, collaboration, efficiency, and learning.

Job Overview:

We are seeking a highly skilled Senior Solution Architect with expertise in .NET, Azure technologies, DevOps practices, Blazor .NET8, CQRS+ & Event Sourcing design patterns, and the ability to manage Azure DevOps pipelines. As a key member of our team, you will lead the design and implementation of scalable solutions while ensuring efficient environment configurations. If you possess a strong background in .NET8 Web API, have experience in Azure DevOps, along with proficiency in Blazor and CQRS+, we invite you to apply.

Responsibilities:

Lead the architectural design and development of .NET8-based applications leveraging .NET Aspire.
Document the design using architectural diagrams and UML.
Implement Clean Architecture principles for scalable and maintainable code.
Utilize Azure services, including Cosmos DB, Azure Entra B2B, Azure Entra B2C, and Azure Service Bus.
Develop real-time applications using SignalR and messaging protocols like gRPC and REST.
Implement Blazor WASM/Server for efficient front-end development.
Apply CQRS+ & Event Sourcing design patterns for scalable and responsive systems.
Establish and enhance CI/CD pipelines, optimizing the software development life cycle.
Implement infrastructure as code (IaC) practices for efficient resource management.
Provide expertise in containerization and orchestration (.NET Aspire).
Write and maintain unit & integration tests at a minimum of 80% executable code coverage using xUnit, MOQ, & bUnit.
Monitor and improve application performance, ensuring high availability and reliability.
Keep up-to-date with industry trends, contributing to the team's technical excellence.
Required Skills

Extensive experience with .NET8 Web API, Microservices, System and UML documentation.
Proficiency in Azure services (Cosmos DB, Entra B2B, Entra B2C, Service Bus).
Strong understanding of Clean Architecture principles.
Understanding of Vertical Slice Architecture
Familiarity with real-time application development using SignalR.
Hands-on experience with Azure DevOps and CI/CD pipelines.
Engineering background with the ability to contribute to development efforts.
DevOps expertise, including Azure DevOps and CI/CD best practices.
Proficiency in .NET Aspire.
Knowledge of CQRS+ & Event Sourcing design patterns.
Experience with Test Driven Development (TDD) principles using xUnit, MOQ, and bUnit libraries.
Proficiency in interaction with 3rd party APIs
OpenAI
Anthropic
Azure DevOps
Social Media (Facebook, X, LinkedIn, Instagram)
Reddit
SendGrid
Solid understanding of prompt engineering in generative AI tools like ChatGPT & Claude
Strong understanding of platform and API security best practices
Experience with Open Telemetry.
Skills to give You a Leg Up:

Azure Certified Solution Architect.
Experience with OpenAPI & Claude specifications for API documentation.
Experience with GCP, Python, Tableau, Power BI, other 3rd party APIs (e.g. Miro, Cloudinary, Zoho, HubSpot, Asana).
Familiarity with .NET Maui.
Previous startup experience and Lean Startup knowledge.
Experience developing drag-and-drop and workflow solutions.
Icing on the Cake Skills (Super cool things that may be a benefit in the future):

Knowledge of GDPR and HIPAA compliance.
Working knowledge of additional technologies like RabbitMQ, GraphQL.
Lean Six Sigma Certification.
How to Apply:

If you meet the above requirements and are excited about contributing to innovative projects, please submit your proposal. Include details of your relevant experience, projects you've worked on, and your approach to architecting scalable solutions and setting up multiple environments.

Hourly Range: $20.00-$35.00
Posted On: August 17, 2024 06:48 UTC
Category: Full Stack Development
Skills:AI App Development, Microsoft Azure, Azure DevOps, .NET Core, Solution Architecture
Skills: AI App Development, Microsoft Azure, Azure DevOps, .NET Core, Solution Architecture
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Quickbase |  Power App| Software Senior Developer - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for an analyst on a part-time/fulltime basis can work many hours a week depending on availability and skillset.

You will be required to log on remote to complete some tasks.

MUST HAVE HIGH-SPEED INTERNET CONNECTION and at least 16GB Of RAM on the computer.

MUST BE WILLING TO VALIDATE WORK, it is not enough to write a formula and hope for the best

Looking for an experienced data analyst
Examples of tasks:
-Help Create Report Quickbase Apps
-Trackers
-Forms
-Calendars
-Develop or maintain Power Apps
- Build Power Automate work flows.

-Create wireframes
-create storyboards
-Documentation/SOPS/user guides

-Finding insights and drawing conclusions
-Formatting (visually appealing)






NOT LOOKING FOR A DEVELOPER THAT JUST FOLLOWS ORDERS looking for someone that can provide solutions. That can teach me not the other way around.


40% of the time is spent analyzing data. It is not enough to create a measure or show a chart must dig into the data. What is the data telling us? these fields are blank is this ok? so many nulls is this right? etc.

20% asking the right questions in order to comprehend and create the business intelligence report. being innovative and condensing disparate pieces of data into actionable insights or succinct reports for senior executives. Proficient with PowerBI, Mcode, and DAX

40 % documentation to help translate business requirements to technical requirements, User Stories, Mockups, wireframes



Must have:
Quickbase
SQL
PowerApps

item.title: Power BI Developer - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking an experienced Power BI Developer with a strong background in Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations (D365 F&O) to join our Business Intelligence team. The ideal candidate will be skilled in leveraging data to create actionable insights and improve decision-making processes across the organization. This role requires proficiency in Azure Data Lake, OData integrations, and advanced data visualization techniques.

Responsibilities:

Design, develop, and maintain scalable and robust Power BI reports and dashboards by integrating data from D365 F&O modules and other sources.
Work closely with business stakeholders to understand their analytics needs and translate business requirements into technical specifications.
Manage data retrieval and processing from Azure Data Lake using OData protocols to ensure seamless integration with Power BI.
Implement data modeling, transformation, and visualization best practices to enhance the reporting and analytics capabilities of the organization.
Optimize and maintain existing Power BI solutions, ensuring high performance, security, and reliability.
Provide technical support and training to business users on Power BI usage and best practices.
Collaborate with IT and data management teams to enhance data governance, quality, and overall data architecture.
Stay updated with the latest trends and developments in Power BI, D365 F&O, and relevant technologies.

Hourly Range: $3.00-$45.00
Posted On: August 16, 2024 22:43 UTC
Category: Data Visualization
Skills:Microsoft Power BI, Data Visualization, Business Intelligence, Microsoft Power BI Data Visualization, Data Analysis
Skills: Microsoft Power BI, Data Visualization, Business Intelligence, Microsoft Power BI Data Visualization, Data Analysis
Country: United Kingdom

item.title: Power BI Report for Health Care Projects - Upwork
item.description:
1. Project Overview
Objective: To analyze customer purchase behavior to improve product recommendations and increase sales.
Stakeholders: Marketing team, Data Science team, Product Management.
Timeline: 6 months.
2. Key Deliverables
Data Collection & Cleaning: Gather and clean data from multiple sources (e.g., sales records, website analytics, CRM).
Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA): Understand the data, identify patterns, and detect anomalies.
Data Modeling: Develop models to predict customer behavior and segment customers based on purchase habits.
Visualization: Create dashboards and reports for stakeholders to easily interpret the findings.
Recommendations: Provide actionable insights to the marketing team for targeted campaigns.
3. Project Phases
Phase 1: Data Collection & Cleaning (2 weeks)
Gather data from internal databases, web analytics, and external sources.
Clean and preprocess the data, handling missing values and outliers.
Phase 2: Exploratory Data Analysis (3 weeks)
Conduct exploratory data analysis to identify trends, correlations, and patterns.
Visualize data to help stakeholders understand key insights.
Phase 3: Data Modeling (4 weeks)
Build predictive models using machine learning techniques.
Validate and refine models based on performance metrics.
Phase 4: Visualization & Reporting (2 weeks)
Develop interactive dashboards using tools like Tableau or Power BI.
Prepare detailed reports with findings and recommendations.
Phase 5: Implementation & Monitoring (3 weeks)
Implement the recommendations in the marketing strategy.
Monitor the impact and make adjustments as needed.
4. Resources Required
Data Analysts/Scientists: 2-3 team members.
Tools: Python/R for analysis, Tableau/Power BI for visualization.
Data Sources: Internal sales databases, CRM, web analytics platforms.
5. Success Metrics
Increase in Sales: Measure the impact of recommendations on sales.
Customer Engagement: Track improvements in customer engagement metrics.
Model Accuracy: Assess the performance of predictive models.

Hourly Range: $30.00-$62.00

item.description:

If you thrive on making a real impact and improving business processes, we'd love to connect!

We're a growing Automation Agency looking for a proactive, detail-oriented Data Analyst who wants to work with well-organized data to create impactful reports and dashboards for our clients.

item.title: BI / Data / Attribution Specialist - Upwork
item.description:
Role Overview:

As a BI / Data / Attribution Specialist, you will be responsible for aggregating data from our database, where we store UTM parameters for all users. Your primary focus will be on tracking both first clicks and last clicks to provide valuable insights into the effectiveness of each advertising channel.

Currently, we can calculate our total CPA (total spend across all ad channels / total number of customers), but this doesn't give us a comprehensive view, particularly concerning organic, email, and other non-paid channels.

We need someone who can help us understand the actual value each channel provides, enabling us to set more accurate CPA targets across Meta Ads, Google Ads, TikTok Ads, and other platforms. At present, we apply uniform CPA targets across all channels, but with your insights, we aim to optimize these targets based on the true performance of each channel.

Key Responsibilities:

Aggregate and analyze UTM data to track first and last clicks across various marketing channels.
Create and manage data visualizations in Google Looker Studio.
Develop insightful reports and dashboards, such as:
Pie charts showing the distribution of first clicks by channel.
Pie charts showing the distribution of last clicks by channel.
Real-time Customer Lifetime Value (CLV) dashboards.
Trial conversion rate dashboards (we have a trial in our subscription model).
Provide actionable insights to inform our digital marketing strategies.
Collaborate with the marketing team to refine CPA targets based on channel performance.
Suggest and implement other data insights and visualizations that could drive business decisions.
Qualifications:

Proven experience as a BI / Data / Attribution Specialist or similar role.
Strong experience with Google Looker Studio or similar data visualization tools.
Proficiency in SQL and ability to work with large datasets.
Solid understanding of UTM tracking, attribution models, and digital marketing analytics.
Ability to translate complex data into clear, actionable insights.
Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
What We Offer:

Flexible part-time, hourly position with the potential for full-time.
A collaborative and innovative work environment.
The opportunity to make a significant impact on our marketing strategies.
Competitive hourly rate.

Hourly Range: $17.00-$50.00
Posted On: August 16, 2024 13:16 UTC
Category: Data Analytics
Skills:Business Intelligence, Data Analysis
Skills: Business Intelligence, Data Analysis
Country: Denmark

item.title: Integrate Multiple CRMs and Build Centralized Reporting Dashboard - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description:

We are a growing business that manages clients who use a variety of CRM systems. We need an experienced data integration and reporting specialist to help us create a centralized solution that can pull data from these different CRMs and generate custom dashboards and reports.

Project Overview:

We have clients on several different CRM platforms, and we need a seamless way to integrate these data sources into one unified system. The goal is to create a dashboard that allows us to track and report on key metrics such as leads, appointments, and sales across all clients, with the ability to visualize growth week over week.

Key Deliverables:

1. CRM Integration: Connect multiple CRM systems (e.g., Salesforce, HubSpot, Zoho, etc.) into a single data platform.
2. Data Aggregation: Collect and aggregate data from these various CRMs into a unified database or spreadsheet.
3. Dashboard Creation: Build a custom dashboard using tools like Google Data Studio, Power BI, Tableau, or similar, that allows us to visualize and report on key metrics across all clients.

item.title: Data Analyst/Developer for POS reporting and dashboard project - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking an experienced Data Analyst/Developer to create a series of detailed POS reports, develop a live dashboard for real-time data insights, and implement functionality for exporting these reports in .csv file format.

**Key Responsibilities:**
- **Data Analysis & Reporting:** Design and generate a series of POS reports that provide clear, actionable insights. This includes sales trends, product performance, and customer behavior.
- **Dashboard Development:** Create a dynamic, real-time dashboard that visualizes key POS metrics and trends. The dashboard should be user-friendly and accessible for stakeholders with varying technical expertise.
- **Export Functionality:** Develop the ability to export reports and data views from the dashboard into .csv files, ensuring that data is structured for easy analysis and integration into other systems.
- **Collaboration:** Work closely with our internal team to understand specific reporting needs, iteratively refine the dashboard, and ensure the solution meets our business objectives.

**Required Qualifications:**
- Proven experience in data analysis and reporting, particularly with POS systems.
- Strong proficiency in data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI) and experience in dashboard development.
- Advanced skills in SQL and database management.
- Experience with scripting or programming languages (e.g., Python, R) for data processing and automation.
- Familiarity with exporting data into .csv formats and ensuring data integrity during the export process.
- Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
- Excellent communication skills with the ability to explain technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.

**Preferred Qualifications:**
- Experience working in the e-commerce or retail sector.
- Familiarity with cloud-based data platforms (e.g., AWS, Google Cloud) for hosting and scaling dashboards.
- Experience with API integration for real-time data updates.

item.title: Company Intranet Site using SharePoint - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking an experienced SharePoint developer to help design, develop, and implement a comprehensive intranet. Our goal is to build an intranet that will serve as the central hub for our company, streamlining communication, document management, and collaboration across departments. The Intranet will include department-specific sites, document libraries, workflows, and customizable dashboards – a summary listing of features and functions is included below.

This project will evolve as we get into it, and I expect it to take 4-6 months until we are complete. We may also be looking for follow-on work to support future functionality.

FEATURES
• Organizational chart
• Employee directory
o Profile pages for employees / highlight their expertise
• Document Repository
o Policies / procedures
o Forms
o Training material
• News/announcements
• Calendar
o PTO/Vacation Calendar with workflow approval
o Holiday schedule (grouped by different offices)
o Company social calendar / Events page
• Project specific home pages (templated for easy future set up)
• Help desk ticketing
• Questions to the CEO / Management. Option to do anonymous.
• Feedback / give thanks / employee recognition. Gamify.
• Virtual Chat Rooms
• Employee polls/surveys
• Motivational / daily quote
• Internal Blog
FUNCTIONS
• Automatic notification on collaboration / active issues
• Task and project management tools, allow for tracking, assigning of tasks, managing tasks, keep team on schedule
• Full site search (including PDF files)
o Comprehensive / full search database
• User personalization (custom widgets, shortcuts, etc)
• Responsive design
• Workflow automations for data entry, approval processes, document routing, etc.
• Centralized document management
• Integrated communication tools (instant messages, discussion forums, video conferencing)
• Sync with O365 Calendar / Ability to view/customize Intranet to see your own calendar or task lists
• Promote pages via email or teams notifications
• Automated reporting
• Permission based views / linking of these permissions based on O365 groups
• Subscribe to content based on topic / tagging of content
• Auto-translate a page to a different language
• Can we generate a report from ViewPoint and auto-post to the Intranet? Accessible based on group permissions.
• Can we control the ability to download files?



Hourly Range: $15.00-$40.00
Posted On: August 15, 2024 22:00 UTC
Category: Web Design
Skills:Microsoft SharePoint, Microsoft Power BI, Microsoft Power Automate, Microsoft Teams
Skills: Microsoft SharePoint, Microsoft Power BI, Microsoft Power Automate, Microsoft Teams

item.title: Create a Professional Animated Video Demo with Voice Over for AWS engagement Phases - Upwork
item.description:
Full Project scope is attached

Title: Create a Professional Animated Video Demo with Voice Over for AWS Engagement Phases
Description:
We are looking for a talented video producer to create an engaging and informative animated video demo that showcases our AWS Engagement process. The video should include animation graphics, a professional voice-over, and incorporate our company logo.
Scope of Work:
1. Video Length: Approximately 3-5 minutes.
2. Phases to Cover:
o Phase 1: Assessment and Planning
ï‚§ Overview of the assessment of current operations, data management practices, and technology infrastructure.
ï‚§ Description of how we work with clients to develop a customized AWS integration plan (e.g., Amazon S3, QuickSight, Lambda).
o Phase 2: Implementation and Integration
ï‚§ Illustrate the setup and configuration of AWS services (e.g., Amazon S3 for storage, QuickSight for data visualization, Lambda for automation).
ï‚§ Emphasize the seamless integration into existing workflows, ensuring minimal disruption and maximum benefit.
o Phase 3: Optimization and Support
ï‚§ Showcase optimization of solutions, training, and ongoing support.
ï‚§ Include the use of Amazon Comprehend, CloudFront, and Chime for enhancing services and team collaboration.
3. Animation:
o Use professional and engaging animation to visually represent each phase and AWS service.
o Incorporate relevant icons, infographics, and smooth transitions.
4. Voice Over:
o A clear, professional voice-over that matches the tone and content of the video.
o Script provided by you, but feel free to suggest any improvements.
5. Branding:
o Include our company logo at the beginning and end of the video.
o Use our brand colors and any specific fonts or style guidelines provided.
6. Deliverables:
o Final video in HD (1080p) format.
o Source files for the video project.
o Separate audio file of the voice-over.
7. Additional Requirements:
o High-quality sound and animation.
o A draft version for review and feedback before finalizing.

Script
[Intro]
[Company Logo Animation]
Voice Over: "Welcome to realtorBI, an AWS Advanced Partner dedicated to empowering real estate agents, brokers, and rental agencies. We specialize in helping you harness the full power of cloud services to streamline operations, enhance productivity, and drive business growth. In this video, we'll guide you through our comprehensive consulting engagement, designed to integrate the top cloud services into a cohesive solution tailored specifically for the real estate industry."

[Phase 1: Assessment and Planning]
[Visuals: Animation showing a business meeting, data charts, and an assessment checklist tailored to real estate scenarios.]
Voice Over: "Phase One begins with a deep dive into your business operations. Our team conducts a thorough assessment of your current processes, data management practices, and technology infrastructure, with a focus on the unique demands of the real estate industry."
[Visuals: Animated icons of AWS services like Amazon S3, QuickSight, and Lambda, customized to real estate applications, such as storing property listings and generating market analysis.]
Voice Over: "We collaborate closely with your team to understand your specific needs, challenges, and goals. Based on this assessment, we develop a customized plan that integrates key AWS services, such as Amazon S3 for scalable storage of property listings and legal documents, Amazon QuickSight for powerful market analysis, and AWS Lambda to automate routine tasks. This phase ensures that we have a clear, tailored roadmap for implementation, with all stakeholders aligned on objectives and expected outcomes."

[Phase 2: Implementation and Integration]
[Visuals: Animation of AWS services being connected and integrated into real estate systems, showing seamless workflows.]
Voice Over: "In Phase Two, we transition from planning to execution. Our team begins the implementation of the AWS services according to the customized plan, ensuring that each service is tailored to meet the specific needs of your real estate operations."
[Visuals: Show animations of Amazon S3 storing property listings, QuickSight dashboards providing real-time market insights, and Lambda automating tasks like client outreach or document processing.]
Voice Over: "We set up and configure Amazon S3 to securely store property listings, client information, legal documents, and marketing materials. Using Amazon QuickSight, we create interactive dashboards that deliver real-time market analysis and data-driven insights, critical for informed decision-making. AWS Lambda is deployed to automate routine tasks, reducing manual workloads and improving efficiency."
[Visuals: Additional services like RDS, DynamoDB, Rekognition, Glue, and Athena integrated into real estate workflows.]
Voice Over: "Additionally, we implement Amazon RDS and DynamoDB for reliable database management, Amazon Rekognition for advanced image analysis—such as property images—AWS Glue for seamless data integration, and Amazon Athena for ad-hoc querying. This phase focuses on integrating these services into your existing workflows with minimal disruption and maximum benefit, tailored specifically for the real estate sector."

[Phase 3: Optimization and Support]
[Visuals: Animation showing optimization of services, training sessions for real estate professionals, and ongoing support.]
Voice Over: "In the final phase, we optimize the implemented solutions to ensure they are fully aligned with your real estate business processes and goals. We provide comprehensive training to help your team effectively leverage these new tools, ensuring you're fully equipped to maximize their benefits."
[Visuals: Icons representing Amazon Comprehend, CloudFront, and Chime, with real estate applications such as analyzing client feedback or streamlining property listings.]
Voice Over: "We use Amazon Comprehend to analyze client feedback and market trends, offering deeper insights into client preferences and market dynamics. Amazon CloudFront is configured to enhance the delivery speed and security of your digital assets, while Amazon Chime facilitates seamless communication and collaboration within your team and with clients."
[Visuals: Animation showing continuous support and collaboration between realtorBI and the client.]
Voice Over: "Our ongoing support ensures you continue to derive value from the integrated AWS services. We work with you to identify and implement further enhancements as your business evolves, helping you stay ahead in the competitive real estate market."

[Outro]
[Company Logo Animation with Contact Information]
Voice Over: "Thank you for choosing realtorBI. With our phased AWS Engagement process, your real estate business is poised to achieve new levels of efficiency, security, and growth. Contact us today to learn more about how we can help you transform your operations with the power of the cloud."



Budget: $500

item.title: Data Analysis Support - Upwork
item.description:
The responsibilities of this role include but are not limited to:
• Prepare graphs and spreadsheets to portray results
• Creating visually compelling charts and tables for reports/presentations
• Creation of PowerPoint slides to present findings
• Test programmed surveys for functionality
• Analyze data using various statistical methods
• Reviewing charts and report findings for accuracy, grammar, recommendations, etc.
• Meet strict deadlines

Required qualifications:
• Bachelor’s degree required
• Knowledge of research methods
• Proficiency with Microsoft Excel, PowerPoint, and Word
• Self-motivated and collaborative
• Ability to work independently
• Strong oral and written communication skills

Preferred qualifications:
• Bachelor’s degree in in Biology, Chemistry, Economics, Social Science, or a related field
• At least 2 years of data collection or data management experience
• Working knowledge of SPSS or other statistical software
• Working knowledge of Think-Cell, Tableau, Power BI, or other data visualization software
